sentences.en: an assembly point
sentences.cn: 集合地点

sentences.en: By 9, the juniors are in the hall for assembly.
sentences.cn: 到9点时，三年级学生都在大厅里等待参加晨会。

sentences.en: cheap self-assembly kitchen units
sentences.cn: 廉价的自己组装的厨房设备

sentences.en: Each component is carefully checked before assembly.
sentences.cn: 每个零件在装配前都经过仔细检查.

sentences.en: Every part is individually checked before assembly.
sentences.cn: 在装配前,部件要逐个检查.

sentences.en: Governor William Livingston addressed the New Jersey Assembly.
sentences.cn: 威廉·利文斯顿州长在新泽西州议会上发表了演说。

sentences.en: He is best remembered for the introduction of the moving assembly-line.
sentences.cn: 他最为人铭记的创举是率先采用流水装配线。

sentences.en: instructions for assembly
sentences.cn: 装配说明（书）

sentences.en: Last year the millionth truck rolled off the assembly line.
sentences.cn: 去年，第100万台卡车驶下流水线。

sentences.en: Police have imposed conditions on public assemblies.
sentences.cn: 警方给公共集会设置了条件。

sentences.en: Restrictions on freedom of assembly have gradually been relaxed.
sentences.cn: 对集会自由的限制渐渐放宽了。

sentences.en: Several proposals are under consideration by the state assembly.
sentences.cn: 有几个提案州议会正在讨论中。

sentences.en: Sovereign power will continue to lie with the Supreme People's Assembly.
sentences.cn: 最高统治权仍然掌握在最高人民会议手中。

sentences.en: The assembly hall was overcrowded long before the performance began.
sentences.cn: 演出开始前,大会堂里早已挤得水泄不通了.

sentences.en: The assembly line of necessity kept moving.
sentences.cn: 生产线势必保持运转下去。

sentences.en: the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland
sentences.cn: 苏格兰长老会大会

sentences.en: The present assembly will be dissolved on April 30th.
sentences.cn: 现在的议会将于4月30日解散。

sentences.en: The provincial assembly were deaf to all pleas for financial help.
sentences.cn: 省议会对所有的经济救助请求都充耳不闻。

sentences.en: the speaker of the California state assembly
sentences.cn: 加利福尼亚州议会议长

sentences.en: This pneumatic tool will double the speed of assembly.
sentences.cn: 这个气动工具可以把装配速度提高一倍.

sentences.en: workers on the assembly line
sentences.cn: 装配线上的工人

words.tran_cn: 装配；集合；聚集；集会；集合物；聚集的物或人
汇编程序；汇编机；装配工

phrases.tran_cn: 装配时间；组合时间；汇编时间
n. 气门总成；活门组件，（气缸的）气门组件

trans.tran_cn: 议会，立法机构，集会（者），组装
trans.tran_en: the meeting together of a group of people for a particular purpose
